Master Tenor: Who but the Kamael can throw an enemy into chaos through cunning movement, or combine Sword and magic in a devastating combination? No one! Where is your courage? Ah, well, it is natural to be anxious without the proper training and preparations. We Kamael are born with a warrior instinct, but that instinct must be nurtured, developed and trained. There is an old saying among our people that you should learn the skills best suited to yourself before engaging in battle. Ah, but we have become sidetracked...
